nodes.text: Porr was a male human who was a member of the Scyre clan where Phasma lived on the planet Parnassos. He wanted to be the new leader, so he murdered Egil in his sleep and broke the main law of the clan. Phasma called him for a duel, and during the combat, Phasma's brother, Keldo, snuck behind him and cut his achilles tendon. Phasma then forced him to choose: death or life with serving her. He chose life.
